classes.title: DPPE801
classes.subtitle: Perspectives in Public Health.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Examines the scope and implications of current public health concerns at the community, state and national level.   Includes practical approaches to the integration of public health activities into the community.Grading status: Letter grade.
